snippet: Lexus has always had legendary customer service, but dealers are now adding two certified positions: a specialist to introduce customers to their cars’ features and and another specialist to provide support with the electronics.
abstract: Lexus has always had legendary customer service, but dealers are now adding two certified positions: a specialist to introduce customers to their cars’ features and another specialist to provide support with the electronics.
